HOME.TITLE: University's Student Care
HOME.LOGIN-TEXT: Log in depending on your status
HOME.PURPOSE-INTRO: The University of Peloponnese, aiming to ensure satisfactory living conditions for its students, but also to promote cultural - social development and physical and mental health during their studies, supports a series of services and benefits such as:
HOME.PURPOSE-LI9: People with disabilities ( Formulation and implementation of equality policies)
HOME.LOGIN-TERMS-H4: Before logging in, please register the internship course in the
HOME.MAIL-RESET-ALERT: Enter your email address and we'll send you a new password.
HOME.STEPS-FOR-INTERNSHIP: ATTENTION! For students to carry out an internship at your institution, the following steps are required in the order listed below
HOME.CREATE-ACCOUNT-STEP: Create an account and post internships in the system
HOME.POSITIONS-ATLAS-STEP: The students of University of Peloponnese can see the positions you have posted in ATLAS and IF they choose you, you will be informed by email
HOME.SYSTEM-ACCESS: Signup to this system and accept students for internship from the University of Peloponnese

STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-INTRO1: The internship office enables the student to apply for the internship on the basis that he/she has
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-INTRO2: registered in the student record the appropriate course
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-STEPS-INTRO: The steps for the internship are as follow:
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-STEP2: Step 2: Complete your profile by clicking at your name (Optional)
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-STEP4: Step 4: View your application and finalise it
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-STEP5: Step 5: View and sign your contract, if it has been issued.
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-STEP6: Step 6: Fill in the entry form
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-STEP7: Step 7: After you have successfully completed your internship, fill in the exit form
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-APP-RESULT-PHASE-MINUS1-PAR: Your application for an internship has been rejected by the internship office of your department because you did not meet the requirements for an internship. As long as you continue your studies at the institution, you will have the opportunity to reapply in the next academic semester.
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-APP-RESULT-PHASE-0-PAR: It is not the internship declaration period or an application for an internship has not been filed yet
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-APP-RESULT-PHASE-1-PAR: Your application has been registered. You will be checked and if you meet the requirements for an internship, your full access to the system will be activated.
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-APP-RESULT-PHASE-2-PAR: Your internship application has been accepted by the department. At a later time, you will be given the opportunity to add a position.
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-APP-RESULT-PHASE-3-PAR: Runner-up: Your application for an internship has been accepted as a runner-up. You can now add positions.
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-APP-RESULT-PHASE-4-PAR: Your application for an internship has been accepted. You can now add positions.
STUDENT.INTERNSHIP-APP-RESULT-PHASE-5-PAR: Your application for a traineeship has been accepted by the organisation you have chosen as you met the requirements.
STUDENT.NO-INTERNSHIP-PERIOD: It's not the current internship period.
STUDENT.PHASE-1: 1. You are currently in the expression of interest phase
STUDENT.PHASE-2: 2. It is the student selection phase

COMPANY.INSTRUCTIONS: Instructions for posting a position and accepting a student
COMPANY.STEPS-INTRO: In case you have not posted an internship position on the ATLAS platform you can post a position from this system. If you have posted a post on the atlas, proceed to step 2
COMPANY.STEPS: The steps for the internship are as follow:
COMPANY.STEP1: Step 1: Post internships positions by filling in all the fields
COMPANY.STEP2: Step 2: See the students who have chosen you and accept the ones you want
COMPANY.STEP3: Step 3: View of the selected students
